column4: when you press alt+ctrl+f2 ubuntu changes to cli mode. A text appeares at the top "Welcome to ubuntu 12.04...". How to change that text?????
How to change the text "Welcome to ubuntu ...." when you press alt+ctrl+f2 ???????
MotD is what you need to change I believe.    http://www.howtogeek.com/104708/how-to-customize-ubuntus-message-of-the-day/
